description:
Panda is jealous of Masaki apprenticeship with Mr. Tree Kangaroo and is determined to find his own Master.  Sasako and Hanada are unexpectedly thrown in the neighborhood sports day.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Panda-kun no Deshiiri / Doubutsu Darake no Undoukai
Panda`s Apprenticeship / A Sports Day Filled with Animals
パンダくんの弟子入り / 動物だらけの運動会
